citations.narrative:
The bottom of the metal self-feeder in one enclosure was rusted through resulting in a hole approximately 1 inch in size
with sharp edges.
Sharp edges in feeders can injure the guinea pigs as they are feeding.
Primary enclosures shall be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the guinea pigs from injury.

There was a pile of approximately 10-15 empty feed bags on the floor of the facility.
Accumulations of trash may serve as harborage for pests and vermin that can negatively impact the health the guinea
pigs.
Premises shall be kept clean and shall remain free of accumulations of trash.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.28(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Primary enclosures. 
The bottom of the metal self-feeder in one enclosure was rusted through resulting in a hole approximately 1 inch in size 
with sharp edges. 
Sharp edges in feeders can injure the guinea pigs as they are feeding. 
Primary enclosures shall be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the guinea pigs from injury. 
3.31(b)  Repeat
   
Sanitation. 
There was a pile of approximately 10-15 empty feed bags on the floor of the facility. 
Accumulations of trash may serve as harborage for pests and vermin that can negatively impact the health the guinea 
pigs. 
Premises shall be kept clean and shall remain free of accumulations of trash. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
